name: Disorder (itch) (zjikra)
description:
Developed for ludum dare 52 :)

Complete the levels by making a mess! If you can do it before the time runs out you get a golden apple.

Controls:

- mouse or wasd to move

- space to dash (unlocked with 5 golden apples)

- j to magnet (unlocked with 10 golden apples)

- k to explode (unlocked with 15 golden apples)
